location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 949 from William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 1 July 1824 (No 41), which reported an earthquake at Shirauz [Shiraz]. It is stated therefore that the Governor of Bombay has authorised the Resident to provide all necessary aid to Meerza Ali Ackbar, the company's agent at Shirauz.
